items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t afraid to get his clothes dirty.
I\'ve worn out two pairs of shoes this year.

I try to read something in French every day.
I used to dream about becoming very wealthy.
Time passed by faster than Tom had expected.
I was just going out, when it began to rain.
Is there an air conditioner in your bedroom?
